name: 6 Solitaire Card Games
description:
Great collection of classic card games to fans of Solitaire:
- Memory
- Spiderette
- Pyramid
- Blackjack
- Tripeaks
- Klondike

You can change both portrait and landscape orientations during the game.

Features:
- 6 solitaire games.
- Languages: English and Spanish.
- Rules.
- Drag and drop cards.
- Autojump to foundations.
- Game rules.
- Animation.
- Restart.
- Support for portrait and landscape mode.
- Sound effects.
- Time of game.
- Counter movements.
- Mute / unmute sound.
